video.title: Optimizing CSS: CSS Tutorial (Day 28 of CSS3 in 30 Days)
video.description:
Good, clean code is always a great idea. Here are some hot tips on optimizing your CSS.

⭐️Files you need ⭐️
💻Sliding Panels Code: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/abppywwt9imwtz6/AAAa0nW3NbO8GFDf7ezKqvCha?dl=0
💻All tutorials in this series need this "_theme-styles" directory (only download once): https://www.dropbox.com/sh/890hx6ke34oovaz/AAByJ-jb-H5pWuIUx7t_GvQqa?dl=0

This video works as a stand-alone tutorial but is also day 28 of CSS3 in 30 Days. For the rest of the series, check out this playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWKjhJtqVAbl1AfjiGyYxwpdAPi5v-1OU

CSS3 in 30 Days is developed by Brad Hussey. Check out his website for more great tutorials: https://codecollege.ca/

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: David Hernandez
topLevelComment.text: You mentioned JS. Do you have 30 Days of JS? (yeah I know about Wes Bos)

topLevelComment.author: creaky
topLevelComment.text: I have a bunch of errors, but i'm also using bootstrap and sass. Interesting tool. I definitely code responsibly, and make sure i keep everything as light weight as possible. Then i will use minified files once the project is final.

topLevelComment.author: pigeonfresh
topLevelComment.text: Aaah, writing styling without a compiler and using a webtool to minify. Those were the days. I would be shocked if this happens at a company.

topLevelComment.author: Jonas Deprund
topLevelComment.text: Hello ! Very cool serie of videos ! Is it possible to have 30 days in JavaScript for the next serie ? Thank you

topLevelComment.author: Business Map
topLevelComment.text:
Sir,Your Tips Are excellent....Thank you for your thirty days.
The Community will Thank you and remember your deeds.

topLevelComment.author: Marius Andersen
topLevelComment.text: Love this series. Also can recomend codekit. Use it everyday.
